subject: Steroids
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Diana Taurasi, who tested positive for a banned stimulant while playing in the Turkish league, said she had never taken performance-enhancing drugs and planned to return to the W.N.B.A.
snippet: Diana Taurasi, who tested positive for a banned stimulant while playing in the Turkish league, said she had never taken performance-enhancing drugs and planned to return to the W.N.B.A.
